content.raw: Thanks for the contributions. The changes look good to me. One thing I noticed is that texture maps on some meshes are not showing up correctly (e.g. PR2, house 3, cordless drill etc). Not sure if is due to the new collada loader or the upgrade to r71 in general. Have to look into this
content.html: Thanks for the contributions. The changes look good to me. One thing I noticed is that texture maps on some meshes are not showing up correctly (e.g. PR2, house 3, cordless drill etc). Not sure if is due to the new collada loader or the upgrade to r71 in general. Have to look into this
